NTCHIFUKWA WULI NKHWAKUKHUMBIKA?
Masuzgu pamwenga masoka nga chilengedu, vingakwaska umoyu widu mu nthowa zakupambanapambana.
-
Asani kwachitika vinthu vakofya, ŵanthu asuzgika maŵanaŵanu. Ndipu ŵanthu wo asuzgika maŵanaŵanu kwa nyengu yitali, kanandi atama.
-
Asani kwachitika soka kweniso masuzgu nganyaki madokotala ngangaŵa ndi ntchitu yikulu ndipu munkhwala ungasoŵa chifukwa akutama angaŵa anandi.
-
Masoka, ngachitiska kuti kuŵi kwakusuzga kuti ŵanthu asaniyi ndalama zakuguliya vinthu vakukhu
... (49 chars skipped) ... 
e Kuziŵa
-
Matenda ngakulu kweniso kusuzgika maŵanaŵanu, vingachitiska kuti mutondeki kusankha vinthu umampha, ndipu mungaleka kuchita vo vingakuwovyani kuja ndi umoyu wamampha. Ivi vingachitiska kuti mutami ukongwa.
-
Asani mulonde cha chovyu chakuchipatala, suzgu yinu yingakuwa ukongwa ndipu umoyu winu ungaŵa pangozi.
-
Asani mwe ndi liŵavu lanthazi, mungasankha umampha vinthu pa nyengu yo kwachitika vinthu vakofya.
-
Kwali mwe akavu pamwenga akukhupuka, mungachita vinthu vinyaki vo vingavikil
... (49 chars skipped) ...
zinyaki, munthu wazeru waŵanaŵaniya masuzgu ngo wangakumana nangu ndipu wachitapu kanthu kuti wangakhwechi. Fundu yeniyi njakovya so pa nkhani yakuphwere umoyu widu. Mungaleka kutamatama pamwenga kutama ukongwa asani muphwere liŵavu linu kweniso panyumba pinu. Kujivikiliya nkhwamampha kuluska kuŵanaŵana kuti asani mwatama madokotala ngakukuchizgani.
“Asani tiphwere liŵavu lidu kweniso malu ngo tija, tingananga ndalama zinandi cha zakuguliya munkhwala kweniso kuchikumana ndi dokotala.”—Andreas. *

Nyuzipepara yinyake yikati: “Mazuŵa ghano, vyamasalamusi vyazara chomene kuluska kale.”—The Wall Street Journal.
MAZUŴA ghano vyamasalamusi vili waka palipose. Mafilimu, mavidiyo, kweniso mu mabuku ŵakulongora fwiti zilara na ŵana wuwo. Chifukwa wuli vyazara nthena? *
Pulofesa Claude Fischer wakati: “Ŵanthu ŵanandi ku America mazuŵa ghano ŵakugomezga chomene vyamasalamusi kuluska kale. Ndipo ŵachinyamata ŵanandi ndiwo ŵali panthazi chomene pa nkhani iyi kuluska ŵalara.”
Lekani ntchakuzizika yayi kupulika kuti ŵanthu ŵanandi viŵanda vikuŵasuzga panji kuŵawofya. Michael Calia wakalemba mu nyuzipepara kuti: “Mazuŵa ghano mitheto ya ŵanthu ŵanandi njakuzara na vinthu vyaufwiti panji kuti vyauchiŵanda.”—The Wall Street Journal.
Lipoti linyake likuti “kulikose pa charu chapasi ŵanthu ŵanandi ŵakugomezga chomene vyamasalamusi, mizguka, na vinyake.” Kafukufuku uyo wakachitika ku United States na pulofesa Christopher Bader kweniso Carson Mencken “wakalongora kuti pa ŵanthu 100, ŵanthu ŵakujumpha 70 ku America ŵakugomezga mtundu unyake wamasalamusi.”
Kasi pali uheni uliwose usange munthu wakugomezga vyamasalamusi?

KASI KUJIYUYURA NI VICI?
Kujiyuyura nkhuleka kujikuzga. Munthu wakujiyuyura wakuwona ŵanyake kuŵa ŵapasi yayi. Munthu uyo ngwakujiyuyura wakumanya kuti ngwambura kufikapo ndiposo kuti wakutondeka vinthu vinyake.
KASI MOZESI WAKALONGORA WULI KUJIYUYURA?
Mozesi wakajikuzga yayi apo wakapika mazaza. Kanandi para munthu wapika tumazaza wakucedwa yayi kumanyikwa usange ngwakujiyuyura panji yayi. Robert G. Ingersoll mulembi wa mu vyaka vya m’ma 1800 C.E. wakati: “Ŵanthu ŵanandi ŵangazizipizga masuzgo.

i waka. Nanga ni apo pakajumpha vyaka 40 wakulongozga mtundu wa Israyeli, Mozesi wakajigomezganga yekha yayi kweni Yehova. Ici cikulongora kuti Mozesi wakaŵa wakujiyuyura comene.
Mozesi wakaŵa na sanji yayi kuti panji ŵanyake ŵangamupoka mazaza ghake. Wakakondwa apo Yehova wakazomerezga Ŵaisrayeli ŵanyake kuti ŵaŵe nchimi nga ndiyo. (Maŵazgo 11:24-29) Apo a wiskevyara ŵakamupempha kuti wasore ŵanalume ŵakuti ŵamovwire kuti mulimo uwo wakacitanga upepukeko, mwakujicefya Mozesi wakapulikira. (Exod

Kasi tikusanga candulo cifukwa ca kuŵa ŵakujiyuyura nga ni Mozesi? Nkhanira kwali! Para tikujiyuyura tikovwira kuti ŵanji ŵaŵe ŵakufwatuka kweniso tikulongora kuti tikuŵatemwa. Kweni cakuzirwa comene nchakuti tikuŵa paubwezi na Yehova Ciuta uyo nayo wali na ukhaliro wakukondweska uwu. (Salmo 18:35) Baibolo likuti: “Ciuta wakwimikana na ŵakujikuzga, kweni wakupeleka lusungu lukuru ku ŵakujiyuyura.” (1 Petrosi 5:5) Tili na cifukwa ciwemi comene cakuŵira ŵakujiyuyura nga ni Mozesi.

UTEŴETI UPHYA
Tati tawelera ku United States, tikakhazikika ku Colorado, uko ŵapapi ŵane ŵakakhalanga. Pakati pajumpha nyengo yichoko waka, mwana withu wakwamba, Kimberly, wakababika. Pakati pajumpha waka myezi 17, tikaŵaso na mwana wachiŵiri, zina lake Stephany. Udindo withu wa kulera ŵana tikawuwonanga mwakupepuka yayi. Tikaŵikapo mtima kusambizga ŵana ŵithu unenesko. Tikakhumbanga kuti titolere chiyelezgero chiwemi cha ŵapapi ŵithu. Tikamanyanga kuti chiyelezgero chiwemi 
... (7248 chars skipped) ...
 tikukhala pafupi na pafupi. Paul na Stephany ŵachali ku Malaŵi uko Paul wakuteŵetera mu Komiti ya Munthavi. Pasono nili na vyaka pafupifupi 80. Nkhukondwa chomene kuwona kuti ŵawukirano ŵanandi awo nkhateŵeterapo nawo, ŵakuchita milimo iyo ine nkhachitanga kale. Viyelezgero viwemi vya ŵabali na ŵadumbu awo ŵakaŵikanga vinthu vya Ufumu pakwamba, vyatovwira chomene kuti tisange chimwemwe chikuru icho tili nacho sono. Nakuti nase talondezga chiyelezgero chawo pakovwira ŵana ŵithu kweniso ŵazukuru.

NG’WINA yikuluma chomene kuluska vinyama vyose ivyo viliko lero. Mwachiyelezgero, ng’wina izo zikusangika ku charu cha Australia zikuluma chomene kuluska nkhalamu. Ng’wina yikumanya luŵiro chomene para chinthu chakhwaska miskati yake (njegheyeghe), kuluska umo munthu wangachitira para kanthu kakhwaska ku kamunwe. Kasi ivi vikuchitika wuli apo ng’wina yili na chipapa (chikumba) chikomi chamagankhamagankha?
Miskati ya ng’wina yili na misipa yinandi chomene iyo yikovwira kuti yichenukenge luŵiro. Wasayansi munyake zina lake Duncan Leitch wakati wasanda ng’wina, wakati: “Msipa uliwose ukufumira pa kakhululu ako kali mu chiwangwa cha mu mutu (bwaza).” Ivi vikuvikilira misipa ya mu miskati kweniso vikovwira kuti ng’wina yimanyenge luŵiro vinthu na kuchenuka. Ntheura, ng’wina yikumanya kupambaniska pakati pa chakurya na viswaswa mu mulomo wake. Lekani ng’wina yanakazi yikuyegha twana twake ku mulomo kwambura kutupweteka. Miskati ya ng’wina njankhongono kweniso yikumanya luŵiro tunthu.
Kasi mukuti wuli? Kasi miskati ya ng’wina yikaŵako yekha? Panji yikalengeka?

Pavuli paki, Chiuta wanguchitisa motu kuti unyekesi Sodomu ndipuso msumba uheni wo wenga pafupi wa Gomora, ndikubaya ŵanthu wosi wo ŵenga mu msumba wo. Lote ndi ŵana ŵaki anthukazi ŵaŵi anguthaŵa. FEBRUARY 10, 2017
AZERBAIJAN
Pa February 8, 2017, Khoti Likuru ku Azerbaijan (Supreme Court of Azerbaijan) likati Irina Zakharchenko na Valida Jabrayilova ŵalije mulandu. Iwo ŵakakakika chifukwa chakuti boma likuti likaŵazomerezga yayi kupeleka mabuku ghakulongosora Baibolo ku ŵanthu. Jaji Hafiz Nasibov, wa Khoti Likuru (Criminal Board of the Supreme Court), wakapharazga kuti Khoti lasanga kuti palije icho Ŵakaboni ŵa Yehova ŵaŵiri aŵa ŵakananga, ndipo likususka na kukana ivyo makhoti ghachoko ghakadumura.
Pakupulikizga mulandu uwu, maloya gha Zakharchenko na Jabrayilova ghakalongosora kuti boma likaswa wanangwa wakubabika nawo chifukwa cha kusuzga Ŵakaboni ŵa Yehova aŵa kwambura mulandu. Khoti likapempha ŵanakazi ŵaŵiri aŵa kuti ŵalongosore nkhaza izo ŵazizipizga kwa myezi yakujumpha 11 kufuma apo ŵakakakikira kweniso umo ŵakhwaskikira.
Loya wakuwona wanangwa wa ŵanthu pa charu chose, Jason Wise wakati: “Ndise ŵakukondwa chomene kuti Khoti Likuru lamazga mulandu uwu. Nakuti nkhakwamba ku Ŵakaboni ŵa Yehova mu charu cha Azerbaijan, kuwona kuti khoti likuru lasuska na kukana ivyo makhoti ghachoko gha mu charu ichi ghakadumura. Tikugomezga kuti khoti la Baku Sabail District Court liwoneseskenge kuti wanangwa wakuti ŵanakazi ŵaŵiri aŵa ŵakwenera kupika ndalama zakuŵaphepiska, wagwira ntchito.”

Manya kuti: Usange asambizgi mbakusuzga ukwenera kuzizipizga. Ivi vizamukovwira kunthazi kuti uzakazizipizge para wasangana na abwana ŵakusuzga. (1 Petrosi 2:18) Ukusambiraso kuwonga para wazakaŵa na asambizgi ŵawemi.

Ivyo Baibolo likuyowoya
Baibolo likuti: ‘Chiuta wazamweruzga ŵazaghali.
’ (Ŵahebere 13:4) Lizgu lakuti “uzaghali,” mu chigiriki ni por·neiʹa, likung’anamuraso kugonana pambere ŵanthu ŵandatorane. Ntheura Chiuta wakukondwa yayi para mwanalume na mwanakazi awo ŵandatorane ŵakukhalira lumoza, nanga ni para ŵakukhumba kuzakatorana kunthazi.
Wuli usange ŵakutemwana chomene? Chiuta wakukhumba kuti pambere mwanalume na mwanakazi ŵandambe kukhalira lumoza, ŵatorane dankha kuyana na dango. Chiuta wali kulenga ŵanthu kuti ŵatemwanenge. Baibolo likuti Chiuta ntchitemwa. (1 Yohane 4:8) Ntheura, Chiuta wakukhumba kuti mwanalume na mwanakazi awo ŵali kutorana ndiwo ŵagonanenge.

KU AUSTRALIA kuli gwalawara waminga (Moloch horridus) uyo wakonkha tumaji kufuma ku jumi, na mchenga wakunyewa. Kufuma apo, tumaji utu tukuluta ku mulomo ndipo wakumwa. Wakuchita wuli? Vyose ivi vikuchitika chifukwa cha chipapa (chikumba) cha gwalawara uyu.
Wonani fundo iyi: Thupi la gwalawara uyu lili na magankha. Ŵasayansi ŵakughanaghana kuti tumaji panji jumi ilo likuwa pa magankha agha, tukukhira pa chipapa na kunjira mu tumphuwu uto tuli pakati pa magankha. Tumphuwu utu nthwakunjilirananjilirana ndipo tukufika m’paka mumphepete mwa mulomo wa gwalawara.
Kweni vikwenda wuli kuti maji ghafume ku malundi, kujumpha mu thupi lake, m’paka kukafika ku mulomo? Ndipo kasi vikwenda wuli kuti para gwalawara uyu wakukwentheska nthumbo yake pa malo ghakunyewa mbwenu wakonkha tumaji?
Ŵasayansi ŵabowozga ivyo vikuchitika. Ŵakuti mukati mwa chipapa cha gwalawara uyu muli tumigelo. Tumigelo utu ndito mukujumpha tumaji. Ntheura chipapa cha gwalawara uyu chikuŵa nga ni thonje ilo likonkha maji.
Janine Benyus wakayowoya kuti para mainjiniya ghangabekera umo gwalawara uyu wakonkhera maji, mbwenu ghangapanga nthowa yakufumiskiramo maji mu mphepo mwakuti mu nyumba muŵenge mphepo zakuzizima kweniso kovwira kusanga maji ghakumwa.
Kasi mukuti wuli? Kasi chipapa cha gwalawara waminga icho chikonkha maji chikaŵako chekha? Panji chikalengeka?

Kasi kucanya na caru vikafuma nkhu? Kasi dazi, mwezi, nyenyezi, na vinthu vinandi vya pa caru vikaŵako wuli? Baibolo likupeleka zgoro launenesko apo likuyowoya kuti vikalengeka na Ciuta. Mwantheura buku lithu likwamba na nkhani za mu Baibolo zakukhwaskana na cilengiwa.
Tisambilenge kuti Ciuta wakayamba kulenga ŵanthu ŵauzimu ŵakuyanako na iyo. Ŵakaŵa ŵangelo. Kweni caru cikalengekera ŵanthu nga ndise. Mwantheura Ciuta wakalenga mwanalume na mwanakazi, Adamu na Heva na kuŵaŵika mu munda wakutowa. Kweni ŵakakana kupulikira Ciuta ndipo ŵakataya wenelero wa kukhala na umoyo.
Kufuma apo Adamu wakalengekera kuzakafika pa nyengo ya Cigumula, pakajumpha vilimika 1,656. Mukati mu nyengo iyi kukaŵa ŵanthu ŵaheni ŵanandi. Kucanya, kukaŵa ŵanthu ŵauzimu ŵambura kuwoneka, Satana na ŵangelo ŵake ŵaheni. Pa caru capasi, pakaŵa Kayini na ŵanthu ŵanyake ŵanandi ŵaheni, kusazgapo ŵanalume ŵanji ŵankhongono. Kweniso pakaŵa ŵanthu ŵawemi nga ni Abelu, Enoki na Nowa. Mu Cigaŵa CAKWAMBA tiŵazgenge za ŵanthu wose aŵa na ivyo vikacitika.

Wiki Chitumbuka
Hitesh Anadkat ni munthu wa bizinesi wa ku Malawi, wakusunga ndalama na wakupeleka vyawanangwa. Iyo ndiyo wakambiska gulu la banki la ku Africa la FMB Capital Holdings.
Umoyo na masambiro
Anadkat wakababikira ku chipatala cha Queen Elizabeth Central ku Blantyre, Malawi mu 1960 apo chalo ichi chikaŵa pasi pa British colonial rule. Dada wake, NG Anadkat wakaŵa wamalonda wakumanyikwa mu Malaŵi. Wakafuma ku India ndipo wali na pasipoti ya ku Britain. Anadkat wali na di
... (790 chars skipped) ... 
l Bank yikapika laisensi ya banki mu Botswana. Mu 2013, First Capital Bank yikagura ntchito za banki ya International Commercial Bank (ICB) ku Mozambique, Malawi na Zambia. Mu 2017, gulu ili likagura masheya ghanandi mu Barclays Bank of Zimbabwe.
Mabanki gha First Capital Bank ghakapelekeka ku kampani ya FMB Capital Holdings mu 2017. Masheya ghake ghakusangika pa Malawi Stock Exchange. Mu 2021, katundu wake wakaŵa $1.4 billion. Anadkat wakulutilira kuŵa na masheya ghanandi, ndipo wakuteŵetera ng
... (790 chars skipped) ...
wa vyake vikuru ni Anadkat Hostel pa University of Malawi College of Medicine, Anadkat-Wellcome Trust Adult Emergency and Trauma Centre pa chipatala chikuru chomene cha Malawi, Queen Elizabeth Central Hospital na Children's ward pa chipatala chenechichi.
Anadkat wakovwiraso pa nkhani ya kusintha vinthu mu jele. Wakususka pa wumba umo vinthu viliri mu jele kweniso umo ŵanthu ŵanandi ŵaliri mu Malawi. Mu 2020, wakazenga jele likuru chomene mu Malawi Prison Services ku Chichiri Prison ku Blantyre..

Matimu aya pala yakumana pakuŵa fuvu tolotolo ngeti ni nkhuzi zikugwazana. Mwahuno timu yiliyose apo yigonenge mbwenu yilotenge va bola pelapela.
Bwana OG Issa ŵalikupeleka K2.5 Million ku Big Bullets kuti yinozgekele nkhombo iyi ndipo ŵafingila kuti machelo kuli kolani mutali na mufupi.
Bwana Kelvin Moyo uyo ngwa pachitengo mu timu ya Big Bullets wati mulenji wa mwahuno ŵadandaulanga kuti ndalama ŵalije zakunozgekela bola la machelo mbwenu tasanga kuti mumuhanya umu ŵa OG Issa ŵatipa K2.5 Million! Tikwiza papo juŵani kuti tikatolelethu.
Sono kwa imwe mwamanyanga yayi naza bola lamachelo zaninge waka chifukwa lizamuŵa ngeti ni Man-U vs Man-City kunozga kwake.
Be Forward Wanderers (Nomads) ni timu iyo yikovwilika na company yaku Japan iyo yikutovwila magalimoto ayo tikugula pa mtengo wakutchipa ndipo timu ya Big Bullets ndiyo yichali kwenda kamgolonthi pa nkhani ya za ndalama
Nangauli Be Foward Wanderers yikatolapo nkhombo iyi ni kale kwene machelo yati kuli wafwawafwa.

Ivyo Baibolo Likuyowoya
Kasi Chiuta wakovwira wuli awo ŵakufipa mtima?
Wakutipa Nkhongono. Chiuta
wakuzgora
mapemphero ghithu na kutipa nkhongono kuti tizizipizge. (Ŵafilipi 4:13) Iyo wamupulikaninge. Baibolo likuti: “Yehova wali pafupi na ŵakusweka mu mtima. Wakuponoska awo mzimu wawo wateketeka.
” (Salmo 34:18) Nyengo zinyake mungatondeka kulongosora umo mukujipulikira mu mtima, kweni Chiuta wakupulika para mwapempha ndipo wakumovwirani.—Ŵaroma 8:26, 27.Tingasambirako ku ŵanyithu. Munthu munyake uyo wakalembako Baibolo wakati: “
A Yehova, nkhumuchemani kufuma mu ndimba ya maji.
” Apo wakafipanga mtima wakapembuzgika. Iyo wakakumbuka kuti Chiuta ngwakunozgeka kutigowokera. Wakati kwa Chiuta: “Muŵenge kuti mukuŵanika maubudi, kasi ni njani wangima? Pakuti imwe mukugowokera zanadi, mwakuti muwopeke
.”—Salmo 130:1, 3, 4.Wakutipa Chigomezgo. Mazuŵa ghano Chiuta wakutipembuzga para tikufipa mtima. Kweniso walayizga kuti wazamuwuskapo masuzgo agho tikufipa nagho mtima. “
Vinthu vyakale [nga kufipa mtima] vikumbukikengeso chara. Ndipo vinjirengeso yayi mu mtima
.”—Yesaya 65:17.
Manyani kuti: Ŵakaboni ŵa Yehova ŵakumanya kuti Chiuta wakovwira para ukufipa mtima. Kweni usange ŵalwara matenda gha kwenjerwa ŵakuluta ku chipatala kuti ŵakawovwirike. (Mariko 2:17) Iwo ŵakuphalira munthu chakuchita yayi pa nkhani ya munkhwala; munthu wakusankha yekha.

MAZU nga chigiriki ngo mu Bayibolu la Charu Chifya akungafwatuliya kuti “galeta” ngangang’anamuwa magaleta ngakupambanapambana. (Machi. 8:28, 29, 38) Kweni viwoneka kuti nduna ya ku Ifiyopiya, yingukwera galeta likulu kuluska magaleta ngo angagwiriskiyanga ntchitu ku nkhondu pamwenga pakuchita maphara. Apo imwe mukwamba kuyowoya na munthu munyake, munyinu uyo mwenda nayo watimbanizgika na chongo cha galimoto. Nakalinga galimoto ya polisi yikwimilira pafupi. Johann Martin Schleyer (18 July 1831 - 16 August 1912) wakaŵa wasembe wa Katolika wa ku Germany uyo wakambiska chiyowoyero cha Volapük. Zina lake lakwamba likaŵa "Martin Schleyer"; kweni wakalemba zina lakuti "Johann" (kucindika dada wake wauzimu).
Umoyo na ntchito[lemba | kulemba source]
Schleyer wakababikira ku Oberlauda (Baden). Kuyana na lipoti lake, fundo yakuti paŵe chiyowoyero cha caru cose yikamba apo wakadumbiskananga na munthu munyake wa ku parishi lake, uyo wakaŵa mulimi wa ku Germany
... (316 chars skipped) ... 
Ss. Mpingo wa Peter na Paul ku Litzelstetten. Pamanyuma pake wakalemba kuti vilimika vinkhondi na viŵiri vyakwambilira mu Litzelstetten vikaŵa vyakukondweska comene mu umoyo wake.
Pa nyengo iyi wakaŵa mulembi wa magazini ya Sionsharfe, iyo yikalembanga chomene vya visambizgo vya Chikatolika. Mu Meyi 1879 wakalemba nkhani yakukhwaskana na Volapük mu magazini iyi. Mu 1880, ŵakalemba buku la mutu wose. Chiyowoyero ichi chikapharazgika chomene ndipo mipingo yiphya yikamba kusangika mu vyaru vyose vy
... (316 chars skipped) ...
aŵe wakukondwa.[1] Sukulu ya sekondare ya Martin-Schleyer-Gymnasium Lauda-Königshofen ku Lauda yili na zina lake.

Ayisraele ŵati afika ku charu cho Chiuta wanguŵalayizga, yiwu asopiyanga mu chihema. Asembi asambizanga marangu ndipu akuyeruzga alongozganga ŵanthu. Chigaŵa ichi chikonkhosa mo vakuchita ndi vakusankha va munthu vingakwaskiya ŵanthu anyaki. Muyisraele weyosi wenga ndi udindu kwaku Yehova ndi ŵanthu. Konkhosani mo vakuchita vaku Debora, Naomi, Yoswa, Hana, mwana waku Jefta ndi Samuele, vingukwaskiya ŵanthu a muchigaŵa chawu. Mukambiyeni mwana winu kuti chinanga mbanthu wo ŵenga Ayisraele cha nge Rahabi, Ruti, Jaelu ndi Agibeoni angusankha kuja kuchigaŵa cha Ayisraele chifukwa aziŵanga kuti Chiuta wenga nawu.

Ŵandu ŵajinji mu ndaŵi ja Nowa ŵatendaga yindu yakusakala. Genesis 6:5
Adamu ni Hawa ŵakwete ŵanace, soni ŵandu ŵatupile pacilambo capasi. Kaneko malayika gane gaŵele ku mbali ja Satana.
Gayice pacilambo capasi ni kuwala yilu ya ŵandu kuti gakombole kulombela acakongwe. Acakongwewo ŵaŵelece ŵanace ŵacalume ŵakulungwakulungwa, ŵaŵaliji ŵakogoya, soni ŵamacili.
Cilambo cagumbele ni ŵandu ŵaŵatendaga yindu yakusakala. Baibulo jikuŵeceta kuti: “Yitendo ya ŵandu pacilambo capasi yaliji yakusakala mnope, soni nganisyo sya mitima jawo syaliji syakusakala ndaŵi syosope.”
Nowa ŵapikanile Mlungu ni kutaŵa combo. Genesis 6:13, 14, 18, 19, 22
Nowa ŵaliji mundu jwambone. Yehofa ŵamsalile Nowa kuti cacijonanga ŵandu ŵakusakala ni cikumba cacikulungwa mnope.
Mlungu ŵamsalilesoni Nowa kuti ataŵe liboti lyekulungwa mnope, liŵalikolangaga kuŵa combo, soni ŵamsalile kuti cajinjisyemo liŵasa lyakwe ni yinyama yamitundu josope.
Nowa ŵakalamwisye ŵandu ya kwisa kwa Cikumba, nambo nganapikanila. Ŵane ŵamsekaga Nowa, soni ŵane ŵam’ŵengaga.
Nowa paŵamasile kutaŵa combo, ŵajinjisyemo yinyama.

1. Kasi Chiuta wakutiphalira uthenga wuli uwemi?
Chiuta wakukhumba kuti ŵanthu ŵakhalenge makora. Wakalenga charu chapasi na vyose ivyo vilimo chifukwa wakutemwa ŵanthu. Sonosono apa, wachitengepo kanthu kuti ŵanthu wose ŵakhale pawemi. Wapumuzgenge ŵanthu ku masuzgo.—Ŵazgani Yeremiya 29:11.
Maboma ghose ghatondeka kumazga vivulupi, matenda, panji nyifwa. Kweni kufipa mtima yayi. Chiuta wawuskengepo maboma ghose gha ŵanthu na kuŵikapo lake. Ŵanthu ŵazamukhala mwamtende, ndipo matenda kuzamuŵavya.—Ŵazgani Yesaya 25:8; 33:24; Daniel 2:44.
2. Chifukwa wuli ŵanthu ŵakwenera kupulika uthenga uwemi mwaluŵiro?
Masuzgo ghazamumara para Chiuta wawuskapo ŵanthu ŵaheni. (Zefaniya 2:3) Kasi ivi vizamuchitika pawuli? Vinthu ivyo vikuyungwiska ŵanthu mazuŵa ghano vikayowoyeka kale mu mazgu gha Chiuta kuti viŵengeko. Vinthu ivi vikulongora kuti Chiuta wali pafupi kuchitapo kanthu.—Ŵazgani 2 Timote 3:1-5.
3. Tichite wuli pera?
Tikwenera kusambira Baibolo kuti timumanye Chiuta. Baibolo lili nga ni kalata iyo yafuma kwa dada uyo wakutitemwa. Likutiphalira umo tingachitira kuti tikhalenge makora sono, ndiposo umo tingazakasangira umoyo wamuyirayira. Ŵanyake ŵakukwenyelera para munthu wakumovwirani kuti mupulikiske Baibolo. Ndipouli, kuti umoyo wamuyirayira uleke kumupambani, mungaŵapulikanga yayi.—Ŵazgani Zintharika 29:25; Uvumbuzi 14:6, 7.

“Ŵanthu ŵakamuyuyura na kumugega . . . Tikamuwona nga ngwakukweŵeskeka, wakutimbika na Chiuta na wakusuzgika”
“Likaŵa khumbo la Yehova kumutimba, . . . Ndipo ivyo Yehova wakukondwa navyo vifiskikenge mwa iyo”
Yehova vikamuŵinya chomene apo mwana wake wakakomekanga. Kweni wakakondwa kuwona kuti Yesu wakaŵa wakugomezgeka. Nyifwa ya Yesu yikapeleka zgoro pa ivyo Satana wakayowoya pa nkhani yakugomezgeka kwa ŵanthu ŵa Chiuta. Kweniso ŵanthu awo ŵalapa ŵakusanga vitumbiko vinandi, ntheura yikovwira kufiska “khumbo la Yehova.”

Logo ya MCP
Chipani cha Malaŵi Congress (MCP) ntchipani cha Malaŵi. Chikayamba mu 1959.
Mdauko[lemba | kulemba source]
MCP chikayamba mu 1959 ni muhaliri ya Nyasaland African Congress (NAC).
Orton Chirwa wakazgoka purezidenti wakwamba wa MCP ndipo pamanyuma wakatora malo gha Hastings Banda wati wafumiskika ku jele la Gwelo. Banda wakalutilira kuwusa mpaka apo wakafwira mu 1997.
Mu mavoti gha mu chaka cha 1961, chipani cha MCP chikapoka vithuzi vyose mu wupu wakulongozga ndipo pamasinda chikalongozga charu cha Nyasaland kuti chiŵe na wanangwa wa Malawi mu chaka cha 1964. Apo Malaŵi wakazgoka charu mu 1966, chipani cha MCP ndicho chikaŵa na mazaza pa charu chose. Kwa vilimika 27 vyakulondezgapo, boma na MCP vikaŵa cimoza. Ŵanthu wose ŵakeneranga kuŵa ŵa chipani. Nyengo zose ŵakeneranga kuŵa na makadi gha chipani.
Gulu la MCP likathera pa mazaza mu 1993 ndipo likathereskeka pa mavoti ghakwamba mu caru ici. Chikulu chomene mu ndyali za Malawi. Ŵanthu ŵanandi ŵakukhala ku chigaŵa chapakati cha charu ichi.
Ŵalongozgi Kuyigomezga[lemba | kulemba source]
MCP ni Anti-Cikomyunizimu, Anti-Wakukoloni, ndipo Conservative chipani.
